message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $8,000.
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm and believe in the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product.

I understand you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $13,000. This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13,500. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it reasonable considering the value you place on the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $13,000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $13,000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm offering the product to you for $13,750. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can wrap up the deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After further consideration, I am willing to pay $13,250 for the product.

I'm not willing to go as low as $13,250, but I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I'm offering the product to you for $13,500. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $13,375 for the product.
